Package obfuscator

Class NameFactory

java.lang.Object
obfuscator.NameFactory
public class NameFactory extends Object
Utility class that manages all name obfuscation operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • NameFactory

      public NameFactory()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static boolean initialize(String outputPath, int maxObfuscatedNames)
      Initializes the NameFactory by generating maxObfuscatedNames of names and shuffling them.
      Parameters:
      outputPath - path to which classes will be written.
      maxObfuscatedNames - the maximum number of names that can be mapped per one execution.
      Returns:
      false if outputPath is not a valid path. True otherwise.

    • obfuscateName

      public static String obfuscateName(String oldName)
      Determines the interaction between nameMap and oldName.
      Parameters:
      oldName - name to be obfuscated.
      Returns:
      mapped obfuscated name if not a utility name.

    • obfuscateClass

      public static void obfuscateClass(String inputClass)
      Obfuscates a class using class visitor. Renames methods and obfuscates inner classes using Tree API of the ASM library. Inner classes are turned into public classes with public methods.
      Parameters:
      inputClass - the full name of the class to be obfuscated. For example: for a class named "MyClass" in "me.domain.project" package the full name will be me/domain/project/MyClass.

    • getNameMap

      public static Map<String,String> getNameMap()
      Returns:
      the current mapping of the obfuscator.
